definition: to keep/to contain/to suck (keep in your mouth without chewing)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The origin type of ore deposit is a subvolcanic hydrothermal gold - bearing , altered rock type.
sentences.chinese: 礦牀成因類型爲次火山熱液含金蝕變巖型。

sentences.english: He discovered, on closer inspection, that the rocks contained gold.
sentences.chinese: 經過更爲仔細的探察，他發現這些岩石含金。

sentences.english: The prospector panned off bits of sand and gravel scooped from the bed of a stream.
sentences.chinese: 探礦者淘選從河牀中挖出的少量含金泥砂和沙礫。

sentences.english: In the Past , Au - bearing character was never researched to Jiao-Lai basin.
sentences.chinese: 膠萊盆地含金性前人未作研究。

sentences.english: The sides of the reliquary are about an inch long and it is 73 percent gold.
sentences.chinese: 這個遺物箱大約一英寸長，含金量爲73%。

sentences.english: The other thing you'll notice from the chart, again, is the quality of the comparables.
sentences.chinese: 表格中另一個值得注意的事項是這項對比的含金量。

sentences.english: I saw that there were many ways I could increase the quality of what I did.
sentences.chinese: 我發現有很多方法可以給我所做事情增加含金量。

sentences.english: Gold ore main type is auriferous quartz vein type.
sentences.chinese: 金礦牀主要爲含金硫化物石英脈型。

sentences.english: The source of elements of mineralization should be primary and secondary gold-bearing geological formations.
sentences.chinese: 成礦元素主要來自原生和次生含金地質建造。

sentences.english: In that light, Griffin's rookie season seems even better.
sentences.chinese: 這麼看來，格里芬的新秀賽季含金量更高。

sentences.english: Each gold medal will have a mandatory requirement of 6 grams of gold.
sentences.chinese: 每一塊金牌必須達到含金量不少於6克的強制性要求。

sentences.english: It was proposed that the gold deposit was metahydrothermal gold-bearing shear zone.
sentences.chinese: 作者定義這類金礦牀爲變質熱液型含金剪切帶金礦牀。

sentences.english: First, have a larger land reserves in the company of high gold content.
sentences.chinese: 首先，有較大的土地儲備，該公司的高含金量。

sentences.english: The major ore type is Gold bearing quartz type with poly metal sulfide containing abundant bullion and much.
sentences.chinese: 礦石類型爲富金銀多金屬硫化物含金石英脈型。

sentences.english: This ore assays high in gold.
sentences.chinese: 這種礦石被驗明含金量高。
這礦石經檢驗證明含金量很高。

definition: copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
